remarks: The union of the range of a function from a finite set into the class of finite sets is finite.  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
unirnffid.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : T --> Fin ) $.
unirnffid.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. Fin ) $.
unirnffid $p |- ( ph -> U. ran F e. Fin ) $.
